TinyMCE Google Translations plugin

Author: Miroslaw Ksiezyk <nsp@h4h.pl>
Revisor: Arsenio Molinero
powered by: Google Translations from Google

version: 1.1
date: 2011-10-18


HOW TO USE
==========================
1. Unpack atrchiwe to plugins directory of TinyMCE


2. Remember to add plugin definition to TinyMCE:

plugins : "google_translations",

3. And place button into toolbar:

...,strikethrough,|,google_translations,|,justifyleft,....

Note: It has added two checkboxes to select the source language and target language. 
Have also expanded the text boxes.
